# continent

**Instance Property**

The continent that contains this region, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
var continent: Locale.Region? { get }
```

## Discussion

This value can be `nil` when the system can’t determine the appropriate continent, such as when the region isn’t an ISO region.

## Examining region properties

- **identifier**: The BCP 47 identifier of the region.
- **containingRegion**: The region that contains this region, if any.
- **isISORegion**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the region is an ISO-defined region.
- **subRegions**: An array of all the sub-regions of the region.
